text: Hey all! I have been using HubSpot for about 4 years now as a consumer and since one year back also doing api connections and development between systems to make the world a faster place :joy: Experience from using HubSpot both from a service supplier AND from a software developer truly gives perspective in how different HubSpot is  being used in different line of businesses. Feel more than welcome to send a pm if you want to chat or share ideas! New in slack though so this will be a fun experience connecting :v:
